website_summaries.verdict: An iconic look for everyday wear.
pros: Comes in black, white, black with white, white with black
Full grain leather upper, Ortholite moisture-wicking sock liner, cushioning EVA midsole, herringbone pattern rubber outsole
cons: Style is better for daily wear than for exercise

customer_reviews.title: Love gold
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes. They match my gold jewelry. Lol very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My wife's happy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit nice looking shoes and my wife loves them! 💪🏿👍🏿
customer_reviews.author: Tony w.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered them for my granddaughter, she absolutely loves them ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for my granddaughter, she absolutely loves them. Wants to wear them all the time even though they were a little too big.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: These are most likely Fauxdidas aka fakes
customer_reviews.text: They look good on inspection but not only was shipping slow, but they didnt come in an Adidas box. They came in a plain brown shoebox.The kid wont know the difference, but I'm betting these are fakes. If I'd known I'd be waiting so long to end up with Fauxdidas at full Adidas price, I'd have gone and bought real ones at the mall.
customer_reviews.author: . Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but quality control - ?
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these but I was shocked by the awful quality of the stitching (see photo). Clearly no quality control on the pair we were sent. Very disappointed. Will return and hope for a normal pair on the reorder!
customer_reviews.author: brookegrant

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Wore these in Dallas for a Bach trip danced the night away and my feet never hurt. Super cute and fashionable. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: MadelynnMT

customer_reviews.title: Looks used
customer_reviews.text: The insert in the shoe is unattached and the adidas sign on the tongue is peeling I definitely will be returning these
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Reed

customer_reviews.title: Siperstars
customer_reviews.text: Item was supposed to be white gold/ metallic blue. But item received was just white and gold. Shoe is great just wrong color
customer_reviews.author: Albert Acosta

customer_reviews.title: My grandaughter loved them!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my grandaughter. They are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong thing Shipped!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased blue Adidas in kids 7, and adult yellow kick offs came! lol sending these back@
customer_reviews.author: SCAM!

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it’s a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My son normally wears a 7 but these are quite big. They run big in my opinion. Otherwise it’s a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: but other that they are fine.
customer_reviews.text: To big but I'll keep them and my daughter can grow into them , but other that they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Authenic adidas shoes came in a adidas box. I am a womens size 9 the kids size 7 fit perfectly. I can't wait to wear them these seem to have good support.
customer_reviews.author: gtgirl

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Kids' Superstar Sneaker
product_meta.description: An adidas Superstar shoe for juniors. These sneakers have a leather upper capped with the famous rubber shell toe and herringbone-pattern outsole.
feature_bullets: Timeless shoes in full grain leather for stylish feet
Full grain leather upper for comfort and a soft feel
Herringbone-pattern rubber outsole provides secure traction
Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite sockliner
